title: Parks & Public Spaces
details:
Location: Bryant Park Corporation
111 West 40th Street, #2400

[Parks & Public Spaces Committee ONLY] Presentation by the Parks Department on an upcoming temporary public art installation in Union Square for June 2020.

[Joint Parks and Landmarks] Presentation by the Central Park Conservancy on four, in-kind capital projects:


Conservatory Garden - "Located along 5th Avenue between E. 104th-106th Street this is an in-kind restoration of the garden's infrastructure, paving, fence and masonry. Limited regrading will be completed on an as-needed basis in compliance with ADA requirements. "
Dairy Access Path - "Consistent with our approach throughout the Park, we will be adding a ramp and regrading the path to the Dairy Visitor Center to achieve accessibility. The path is located mid-park, near 65th Street."
 Bendheim Playground - "Located at E. 100th Street, the scope of work is limited to the composite play structure, which will be replaced to address accessibility and safety standards." 
Perimeter - "As part of our effort to restore the perimeter in full, we will be doing an in-kind restoration of the perimeter from E. 85th-90th Street." 




Conservatory Garden - "Located along 5th Avenue between E. 104th-106th Street this is an in-kind restoration of the garden's infrastructure, paving, fence and masonry. Limited regrading will be completed on an as-needed basis in compliance with ADA requirements. "
Dairy Access Path - "Consistent with our approach throughout the Park, we will be adding a ramp and regrading the path to the Dairy Visitor Center to achieve accessibility. The path is located mid-park, near 65th Street."
 Bendheim Playground - "Located at E. 100th Street, the scope of work is limited to the composite play structure, which will be replaced to address accessibility and safety standards." 
Perimeter - "As part of our effort to restore the perimeter in full, we will be doing an in-kind restoration of the perimeter from E. 85th-90th Street." 


[Landmarks Committee ONLY]   222 Central Park South Apt 4, b/w 7th and Columbus Circle, application for a change of function for the two end windows on the 3rd Floor steel metal window assembly, from the original double-hung function to casement.
